Actions.Name: Chain Lightning
Actions.AreaEffect: A foe in range 3 from the attack target also takes [fray] damage, then must save. If they fail the save, this effect repeats, choosing a new foe in range 3 of them instead. A character can only be chosen once by this effect, but it can chain any number of times. Electrified characters take +1 curse on this save.

Actions.Name: Shock
Actions.Description: A character in range 8 is vulnerable. Vulnerable foes take piercing fray damage and become electrified.
